review: She is an amazing Doctor. She is so patient and gives you time. She is the kindest Doctor I've ever met. She clarifies all your doubts and help you to see things clearly. She is a credit to her profession. Please go to her without searching further. She is not only a great Doctor but an amazing human being and we all need that human touch specially in a Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ashima is an extremely compassionate and professional doctor.  She handled my pre-term delivery with patience and encouraged me to deliver normally. Thereafter, her tips on postpartum care were very useful for my healing. With Dr. Ashima, I have found my gynae for life.

felt that she is not just a doctor but a friend who is always there to support you even when I was undergoing a difficult time. I was relieved with the kind of support. But later on, she completely stopped answering to my issues. It is very disappointing. I did not wish to write this but I have to as I am deeply disturbed by this kind of a behavior where a doctor who seemed supportive decides to keep a patient neglected. I was told that I would get support but alas. With a great disappointment and reluctance, I wrote this.

I will always remember the care and compassion extended to me by Dr. Ashima Gulia during my gynaecological issue. She is the perfect blend of a professional attitude and kind demeanour. She explained all options and left the decision on us. Will always approach her in future.
